daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: In New York City, a severe winter storm has caused widespread power outages, with Con Edison attributing the issues to salt spread, while emergency shelters are being opened amid rising cold-related fatalities; meanwhile, a four-alarm fire in the Bronx has left residents displaced and injuries reported.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts

- Thousands lose power in Brooklyn due to salt spread, Con Ed reports.
